alert.note: Alert for Mills; Montgomery; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 12:30AM CDT until June 15 at 12:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY...NORTHEASTERN MILLS AND SOUTHEASTERN POTTAWATTAMIE COUNTIES... At 1229 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Henderson, or 10 miles northwest of Red Oak, moving east at 40 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY...NORTHEASTERN MILLS AND SOUTHEASTERN POTTAWATTAMIE COUNTIES. HAZARD...80 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be heavily damaged. Expect considerable damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles. Extensive tree damage and power outages are likely. Locations impacted include... Red Oak, Oakland, Malvern, Treynor, Carson, Emerson, Elliott, Macedonia, Hancock, Henderson, Hastings, McClelland, Old Town Park, Farm Creek Public Wildlife Area, Botna Bend Park and Weston. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...80 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
